mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hcc_hospital_info_tb WHERE hospital_info_status = 'Y' ORDER BY hospital_info_reg_date DESC

SELECT a.*, b.user_name FROM hcc_hospital_info_tb a, hcc_user_tb b WHERE a.hospital_info_seq = #{boardseq} AND a.hospital_info_reg_seq = b.user_seq AND b.user_status = 'Y' AND a.hospital_info_status = 'Y'

SELECT a.*, b.user_name FROM hcc_hospital_info_reply_tb a, hcc_user_tb b WHERE a.hospital_info_seq = #{boardseq} AND a.hospital_info_reply_reg_seq = b.user_seq AND b.user_status = 'Y' AND a.hospital_info_reply_status = 'Y' ORDER BY a.hospital_info_reply_reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hcc_hospital_info_tb ( hospital_info_title, hospital_info_content, hospital_info_score, hospital_info_reg_seq, hospital_info_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{star}, #{writerseq}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE hcc_hospital_info_tb SET hospital_info_title = #{title}, hospital_info_content = #{content}, hospital_info_score = #{star}, hospital_info_upd_date = NOW() WHERE hospital_info_seq = #{boardseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hcc_hospital_info_reply_tb ( hospital_info_seq, hospital_info_reply_seq, hospital_info_reply_comment, hospital_info_reply_reg_seq, hospital_info_reply_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{boardseq}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(hospital_info_reply_seq) , 0) FROM hcc_hospital_info_reply_tb ) + 1, #{comment}, #{writerseq}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO hcc_hospital_info_reply_tb ( hospital_info_seq, hospital_info_reply_seq, hospital_info_reply_subseq, hospital_info_reply_comment, hospital_info_reply_reg_seq, hospital_info_reply_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{boardseq}, #{replyseq}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(hospital_info_reply_subseq) , 0) FROM hcc_hospital_info_reply_tb ) + 1, #{comment}, #{writerseq}, SYSDATE )
